description:
Newly decorated, newly renovated apartment with new furniture, kitchen, plumbing, heat. Heart of Bushwick, Brooklyn, 24 hour grocery store 1 block away, incredible bars, cafes, restaurants, street art, 20 minute access to Manhattan.  

Sleeps up to 4: Double bed (2), Sofa (1), Futon (1). Message if 2 beds needed. 

You’ll love my place because of the location, the coziness, the decor, the newness. My place is good for couples and families (with kids).

Incredible modern decor and art.

You can have use of the apartment.
name: Brooklyn Modern Style + Quality
